dcterms:description: The Synapse dataset is from MICCAI 2015 Multi-Atlas Abdomen Labeling Challenge, which contains 3779 axial contrast enhanced abdominal CT images in total. The training set contains 2212 axial slices.
dcterms:title: Synapse Multi-Organ CT

dcterms:creator: Chen Chen
Wenjia Bai
Daniel Rueckert
dcterms:description: The left atrial (LA) dataset is from the 2018 Atrial Segmentation Challenge, containing scans for training and evaluation, specifically designed for left atrial segmentation.
dcterms:title: Left Atrial (LA) Dataset

dcterms:description: PROMISE2012 dataset contains 50 3D transversal T2-weighted MR images of the prostate with manual binary prostate gland segmentation, obtained from multiple centers with different acquisition protocols.
dcterms:title: PROMISE2012
